title: What’s on Google TV: Stranger Things 4 trailer, HBO Max takes #3 slot in streaming wars
content:
This week Netflix released the first trailer for Stranger Things 4, the next season of the acclaimed show, while HBO Max reportedly earned the third slot in the streaming wars. Here’s what you need to know.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Stranger Things 4 trailer, HBO Max takes #3 slot in streaming wars appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The first trailer for Stranger Things 4 has made its debut, just as Netflix rolled out a new double thumbs up button to all users.
